Here is my take: MC is way too late to confess and a bit too daydreamy; FMC is horny af slut, loves Kaito (don't forget she is the one that WENT & LOOKED for Kaito) and somewhat Haruta too (but more like a lil bro or stupid idea "wait until he's adult")(though it seems she's being influenced by Kaito to make her date Haruta for Kaito's fetish sake) but sinks into lust; Kaito is a sick fuck that gets turned on from stealing other guys' GFs with his overconfident ego and large penis (typical NTR element); Momota-san could be that side support character for MC that author put in (just-in-case scenarios) as his own 'plan B' for the series as well. Reading from part 1, right off the bat, I felt that FMC already picked her love interest in Kaito but has some sliver of love for MC, a wishy-washy feeling. Well, we wait now for next part...

Then he keeps telling her to date him cause he'd love to do some NTR then she all of a sudden goes I think I love the little brother. Then this one comes out of nowhere and have it seem like the two of them love each other but in the end cause he took to long to confess she's already been "taken". Which makes it all the more weird since in the first part the second the older dude came back to town she ran to his apartment to confess her feelings for him and sleep with him, then even keeps saying she wants to have his kid so he can be "responsible" for her. Like the art but yeah this felt like a real asspull plot to be honest.

When you break it down, Kaito is the biggest douche and manipulator, since he took advantage of MFC's crush on him, knowing that Haruta likes her, so that he could steal her from him later down the line. He's honestly the most twisted and sick between the two, while the MFC is just delusional thinking Kaito actually likes her, but she failed to realize that she became fond of Haruta after looking out for him and being friends for so long. Now she is dealing with liking Haruta a little bit too, since she it looks like she felt a little intimidated by Momota during the classroom scene. It's just a huge mess all around between these two. Haruta is the only one out here thinking about a stable future and growth, so hopefully the plan B Momota was referring to could be Haruta going out with her instead after the truth comes out.
